posts.post_content:
Posted By: Tim Newcomb
ODDS AND ENDS SALE 

Scans for most of these can be found [url]http://s192.photobucket.com/albums/z9/apspr/[/url]

For other scans, feel free to email me--

Emails take priority over posts.  First person to commit to buying has priority.

Checks/money orders preferred to avoid paypals fees, but paypal is negotiable.

S/H (first-class with insurance) included in these prices.   If you want a higher-end mailing method like Express or Priority Mail, please add enough to cover it.

Some of these prices are negotiable, others I cant drop any lower as I have this much or more in them.  

W754 1941 Cardinals Team Issue
Shoun (EX-MT) $12
Crouch (EX-MT) $12
Breadon (EX-MT) $12
Hutchinson (EX-MT front, light back scuffing) $8
Wares (VG) $8

T206 Irv Young (Good, with a buncha light creases) P350 back  $18

1913 Polo Grounds Game Jim Scott G-VG SOLD


GRADED: 

1922 Exhibits Flagstead SGC60 nice corners, clean back  $60

E90-1 Bemis Tough card!  SGC20$150

E92 Nadja Wallace GAI 2.5$200
E92 Nadja Bailey  SGC50$200
E92 Nadja StoneSGC20$75
